officialTitle: Improving Beta Cell Function in Mexican American Women With Prediabetes
inclusionCriteria:
* Mexican-american
* Female
* BMI 30-42
* willingness to complete protocol
* pre-diabetic
* English or Spanish literate
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 40 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* pregnant
* 30 min or more of moderate to vigorous activity more than 3 times per week
* cardiovascular disease
* physical limitations that might be aggravated by moderate physical activity
* planning to move in next 12-24 months
* diabetic
